page.title: 07Local History
page.content: A long time ago there used to be a blacksmith at Glass-house farm.Then it was turned into a pub, now it is a farm house with people living in it. There used to be a lot of carpenters around, now there are not so many. The farmers used to work horses instead of tractors like they have now. It used to be marsh and fenland around here then the land was drained. There are a lot of drains and dykes around now so it doesn't flood.They had to dig the dykes out with spades because draglines weren't invented then. All the farming in the old days used to be done by horses and hand.The seed sowing usd to be done by hand,so did the weeding.Now most weeds are killed by chemical sprays.
